mapper.select: SELECT dru.drug_name,dst.amount,dia.description,usr.name,pat.p_name from drug_stock dst LEFT JOIN drug_profile dru on dst.drug_id = dru.drug_id LEFT JOIN diagnosis dia on dst.diagnosis_id = dia.diagnosis_id LEFT JOIN user_profile usr on dia.user_id = usr.user_id LEFT JOIN patient pat on dia.patient_key = pat.patient_key WHERE dst.diagnosis_id = #{diagnosisID}
